title: "Video: Richmond company introduces healthcare robots to Canada"
excerpt: "A Richmond-based technology company has developed robots to help with healthcare, security and delivery tasks. Axniix is hoping this new technology, developed with a Taiwanese robot manufacturer, will transform the health-care sector in Canada by supporting nursing staff and making sure patients are safe."
